overview:
## Discussion

Invoke this method to forfeit a match when the local player isn’t the current participant. To receive turn-based events that this method generates, register a listener that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedEventListener] protocol with the local player. See [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/starting-turn-based-matches-and-passing-turns-between-players].

# participantQuitOutOfTurn(with:withCompletionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Forfeits the match on behalf of the local player when it’s not their turn.

## Declaration

```swift
func participantQuitOutOfTurn(with matchOutcome: GKTurnBasedMatch.Outcome, withCompletionHandler completionHandler: (((any Error)?) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
func participantQuitOutOfTurn(with matchOutcome: GKTurnBasedMatch.Outcome) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **matchOutcome**: The outcome of the local player who forfeits the match. Don’t pass `nil` as this parameter.
- **completionHandler**: The block that GameKit calls when it completes the request.

The block receives the following parameter:



## Discussion

Invoke this method to forfeit a match when the local player isn’t the current participant. To receive turn-based events that this method generates, register a listener that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedEventListener] protocol with the local player. See [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/starting-turn-based-matches-and-passing-turns-between-players].

## Forfeiting a Match

- **participantQuitInTurn(with:nextParticipants:turnTimeout:match:completionHandler:)**: Forfeits the match on behalf of the local player when it’s their turn.
- **GKTurnBasedMatch.Outcome**: The state of a participant when they forfeit a match or when a match ends.
